articles.content: For most of her life, Alyssa Fraser took comfort in cooking. Fraser, a former food reporter from Minnesota, used to relish the process of whipping up her favorite chicken and vegetable recipe or batc… [+9508 chars]

articles.title: Huawei’s HarmonyOS Takes On Windows 11 with Enhanced UI and Performance — But Deprived of App Sideloading & Backward Compatibility - Wccftech
articles.description: Huawei has launched the HarmonyOS for laptops, and while it comes with several features, it won't support sideloading applications.
articles.content:
Huawei finally launched the counterpart to Windows 11 a few days ago, and while it did come with several impressive features, the OS won't support sideloading applications.
